item.description:
Four stylish boutiques are rolling out the red carpet and highlighting fallâ€™s hottest fashions. The Fairview Corner Fashion Sidewalk show begins at 6:30pm on November 1st, 2012, 162-170 Spring Street in West Roxbury. The female owners of Fabutique, Top It Off, Kalembar Dune, & Baker Baker Bakery all located in Fairview Corner have teamed up for this first annual sidewalk fashion show, which will include models outfitted in clothing and accessories by Fabutique and Top It Off.

Astra Salon owner/hair stylist Michael McMurrough will be doing all the blow outs for the models; two local make-up artists, Silvia Manning & Barbara Campbell of La Residencia Spa in Newton will be on the premises making sure the girls look fabulously chic! The shops, Top It Off, Fabutique, Baker Baker Bakery, & Kalembar Dune will have complimentary wine, refreshments, food, & sweet treats from the brand new bakery, Baker Baker! All shopping will be open through the duration of the evening. The red carpet will feature such designer labels as: Greylin, Rock Revival, Silver Jeans, Hazel, Papillion, Kische, and much more!

A $5 suggested donation is appreciated and 100% of those donations will be given to the Roslindale Food Pantry in light of the upcoming holidays!

Located at the corner of Baker Street and Spring Street in West Roxbury! There is a parking lot around the back of the building!

Come join the party! All four shops will offer complimentary drinks, savories and sweet treats from their latest addition, Baker Baker! All shops will be open through the duration of the evening. This is sure to be an event to remember!!
item.name: Fashion Mob Event for the Ladies of Red Sox Natives
